FuncDef: The reset nhrp statistics interface command clears NHRP packet statistics on a specified tunnel interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of a tunnel source interface.
-

Specifies the number of a tunnel source interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command clears NHRP packet statistics on a specified tunnel interface. This helps you locate DSVPN faults quickly.
Prerequisites
NHRP must be enabled on a tunnel interface, and NHRP parameters are configured.
Configuration Impact
This command clears NHRP packet statistics on a specified tunnel interface.
Precautions
Statistics cannot be restored after being cleared. Therefore, confirm the action before you run the command.
